greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of a constant related to A259373.
formula: Equals limit n->infinity Product_{k=1..n} p(k)^k / (exp(Pi*sqrt(2/3*(k-1/24))) / (4*sqrt(3)*(k-1/24)) * (1 - sqrt(3/(2*(k-1/24)))/Pi))^k, where p(k) is the partition function A000041.
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 26 2015
